1.title: Cosy Suppers

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

1.plot: Dave Myers and Simon King cook some of their favorite comfort food. The Bikers cook dishes perfect for cosy suppers, including a new take on steak and chips.

2.title: Spice It Up

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

2.plot: The duo cook dishes guaranteed to turn up the heat. Including a spicy new take on a family favourite with their roasted spiced cauliflower cheese and they take inspiration from the Caribbean with a plate of jerk pork chops.

3.title: A Taste of Cumbria

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

3.plot: Dave enjoys a taste of his native county, Cumbria, as he and Simon cook recipes with great local ingredients. Including a comforting supper dish made from Cumberland sausage and the ultimate Cumbrian dessert, sticky toffee pudding.

4.title: Come on Over

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

4.plot: The duo cook the perfect dishes to share with the people we love. These are indulgent treats for when family and friends come on over - a baked cheesecake, a crowd-pleasing terrine and the ultimate beef sandwich.

5.title: Pub Grub

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

5.plot: The Hairy Bikers cook some classic pub food with a twist, giving a new look to a traditional pudding, taking on the north-east's chicken parmo, and revealing the secrets behind the ultimate fishcake.

6.title: Classics

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

6.plot: The Hairy Bikers reveal the secret behind their ultimate biker burger and cook two of their favourite desserts - a showstopping meringue and a modern take on a classic banana split.

7.title: Posh-ish Nosh

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

7.plot: The pair push the boat out, using top-notch ingredients in special recipes to create showstopping dishes. They've updated an old favourite, the rum baba, and are making the most of a great cut of beef in a traditional Greek stifado.

8.title: Nostalgia

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

8.plot: The pair cook dishes that conjure up childhood memories, holiday favourites and tastes of days gone by. The Bikers cook a Lancashire hotpot just like Dave's mother used to make, and a French speciality brings back holiday memories for Si.

9.title: A Cut Above

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

9.plot: The Bikers take everyday ingredients and transform them into comforting dishes that are satisfying and surprising. Bananas are transformed into a sophisticated tarte tatin and ricotta cheese is the basis for gnudi - Italian dumplings.

10.title: Crowd Pleasers

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

10.plot: The chefs cook dishes to feed a multitude - just the thing to impress guests or to fill up the family. Their salmon pie with spinach and hollandaise is a showstopper and their chocolate and cherry buns makes a perfect centrepiece.

11.title: It's Cold Outside

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

11.plot: Si and Dave cook dishes for when the temperature drops and the weather calls for good hearty cooking. Oxtail soup with herby dumplings, a vegetarian chestnut and mushroom pie and a new take on an old favourite, treacle sponge.

12.title: Traditional Values

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

12.plot: Dave and Si whip up dishes which evoke traditional values. They put a twist on a classic pudding, create a perfect teatime treat and combine two breakfast favourites to make one lip-smacking new dish.

13.title: A Taste of Northumberland

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

13.plot: It's a trip back in time for Si as the Bikers cook dishes from his home county - Northumberland. This means a celebration of local seafood, a traditional lamb recipe and a new way of serving his favourite ice cream.

14.title: Feel-Good Meals

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

14.plot: The duo cook some of their favourite recipes which are both healthy and delicious. There is a wholesome warming soup, a chic healthy pudding and even a low-fat version of a family favourite, burger and fries.

15.title: DIY

episode of.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (TV Mini-Series 2017)

15.plot: Si and Dave tackle dishes that you never dreamed you could make yourself. But they prove that homemade can beat shop-bought when they prepare gravlax, jam doughnuts, their own corned beef and even an Indian favourite, paneer.

imdb.title: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food
akas: The Hairy Bikers' Comfort Food (United Kingdom)
plot: The Hairy Bikers return with a new series in which they cook some of their favourite comfort food. From feasts for friends and family to meals inspired by pub grub, they create the ultimate feel-good dishes.::Mark_a_Wood <markawood@hotmail.co.uk>
